Compare (FUN)
Compare (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION Compare : DINT
Returns an integer comparing two strings lexicographically.
The result will be 0 if
itfString1
=
itfString2
, -1 if
itfString1
<
itfString2
, and +1 if
itfString1
>
itfString2
.
